*div1 type="summary"* *p*Inquiry concerning Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Land Office Henderson County*/location_mentioned**/p* *p**location_mentioned*state of Tennessee*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="03-15-1826">March 15th 1826*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Dr. Sir—From an acquaintance I have with your *person_mentioned*fathers family*/person_mentioned* particularly *person_mentioned*Jas. Austin*/person_mentioned* who lived with me in my *person_mentioned*fathers family*/person_mentioned*, in the state Of *location_mentioned*Kentucky*/location_mentioned* while he was at *location_mentioned*school */location_mentioned*I take the liberty of addressing you a letter which I hope will be spedily answered there is about to be made up a *person_mentioned*company */person_mentioned*to emigrate to the *location_mentioned*province Of Texas*/location_mentioned* I wish to make one of it but least I might not be satisfied with that *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*, I wish you as I know you from Character to write me a letter concerning that *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* as to the soil health waters etc and the particular terms upon which *person_mentioned*settlers */person_mentioned*go there upon, how much land a *person_mentioned*man of family*/person_mentioned* would be entitled to, and also a sketch Of Your laws, and some of the most important clauses in your constitution, which might concern an *person_mentioned*american */person_mentioned*as well as your religious restrictions etc the distance from *location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned*, by water the distance from the *location_mentioned*Chickasaw Bluffs*/location_mentioned* by land as near as you can guess— accompanied with your advise Of the importance of driving cattle hoggs etc. etc. whether your soil and climate is adapted to the culture of cotton, and whether groceries can be conveniently, and low, whether your lands are heavily Timbered Or barrony, the *location_mentioned*Rivers*/location_mentioned* you would advise me On, etc. etc. etc If *person_mentioned*Jas Austin*/person_mentioned* is with you Or in reach of you I should be verry glad, he could hear from me, and tell him to write to me etc*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jno. C Walker*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] To *person_mentioned*His Excellency Stephen F. AustinGovernor of the *location_mentioned*province of Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* */p*
*p*Via of *location_mentioned*Nacatoches*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
